short_instructions.2-3 Artist 12:
Waihangahia tētahi porohita hei whakaoti i te karu!\
\
Mēnā ka huri 1 putu te rehetoi i ia koromeke, e hia anō ngā wā hei tōai i te waehere ki te tā porohita? 180? 360? 500?
short_instructions.2-3 Artist 2 new: Kua oti noa te huarua o tētahi o ngā pakitara o tēnei whare. E 100 ia taha, engari e 50 te pakitara kāore anō i oti. Whakaotia te pakitara.
short_instructions.2-3 Artist 4: Āwhinatia mai te hanganga o te whare mō tēnei ngeru.
short_instructions.2-3 Artist Free Play: He tākaro-herekore! Tāngia tāu e pai ai.
short_instructions.2-3 Artist Loops New 15: Na, tāngia tāu i hiahia ai!
short_instructions.2-3 Artist Nested Loops 10: Koromekehia tēnei waehere kia 12 ngā e oti pai ai te tauira.
short_instructions.2-3 Artist Nested Loops 12: Koromekehia tēnei waehere kia 12 ngā wā e oti pai ai ngā tōrinorino.
short_instructions.2-3 Artist Nested Loops Free Play: He tākaro here-kore, tāngia tētahi mea rawe ki ētahi koromeke tauroto.
short_instructions.2-3 Bee Conditionals 9: Kohia te waihonga i ia putiputi.
short_instructions.2-3 Bee Functions 3: Kohia te waihonga i ia putiputi.
short_instructions.2-3 Bee Functions 6: Ināianei, whakamahia taua taumahi anō rā ki te kohi waihonga i ngā putiputi e 3.
short_instructions.2-3 Bee Loops 2A: Ināianei, whakamahia tētahi koromeke kia kohia katoatia te waihonga.
short_instructions.2-3 Bee Loops 3A: Whakamahia tētahi koromeke ‘tōai’ hei kohi i te katoa o te waihonga.
short_instructions.2-3 Maze 10: Homai ki ahau te kino kākāriki! (Kia mataara i te TNT)
short_instructions.2-3 Maze 2: E whakahōhā pai ana te poaka nei i aku raukura. Āwhinatia ahau kia tae atu ki a ia!
short_instructions.2-3 Maze 4: Homai ki ahau te kino kākāriki! (Kia mataara i te TNT)
short_instructions.2-3 Maze 6: Kia tau te mauri ka aratakina ahau ki te whai i te poaka kino. Kei mau rānei taku ito!
short_instructions.2-3 Maze 7: Homai ki ahau te kino kākāriki! (Kia mataara i te TNT)
short_instructions.2-3 Maze 9: Homai ki ahau te kino kākāriki! (Kia mataara i te TNT)
short_instructions.2-3 Maze Loops 17: Kawea tāu i ako ai kia arataki i au ki te putiputirā!
short_instructions.2-3 Maze Loops 20: Aratakina ahau ki te putiputirā mā te whakamahi i ngā nama paraka rua rua noa iho!
short_instructions.2-3 Maze Loops Assessment 1: He aromatawai: Haria ahau ki te putiputirā ki/me ngā paraka e 5!
short_instructions.4-5 Artist 3.5: Ka pēhea mēnā ka whakahaerehia tēnei waehere (ka pēhi rānei i te "Whakahaere" ka whakamātau ai). Nā, ka tōaitia te waehere kia oti te tānga!
short_instructions.4-5 Artist 4: E hia putu i te porowhita nei? Koromekehia ngā paraka e waihanga mai ai tētehi porowhita tae.
short_instructions.4-5 Artist Assessment 1: He aromatawai: Whakamahia tētehi koromeke hei tuhi i te tapatoru ōrite. He 300 pika ngā taha.
short_instructions.4-5 Artist Free Draw 1: Tā kore here! Tāngia tāu e wawatahia nei.
short_instructions.4-5 Artist Patterns 7: Me whakarerekē i te waehere nō tērā atu panga kia waihanga mai i tēnei tauira uaua ake. Tirohia ināianei ngā wāhi e inaki ana ngā taimana, whakamātauria te "peke whakamuri" tuatahi mai i te 100 ki te 50 (haurua noa iho) - he pēhea ināianei te tawhiti o tā te rehetoi "peke whakamuri" tuarua?
short_instructions.4-5 Bee Debugging 10: Rapua ngā hapa ka whakatika ai.
short_instructions.4-5 Bee Debugging 2: Āwhinatia te pī ki te kohi waihonga, mahi mīere hoki.
short_instructions.4-5 Bee Debugging 3: Rapua ngā hapa ka whakatika ai.
short_instructions.4-5 Bee Debugging 4: Kāore ēnei paraka e haere. He aha te tauira?
short_instructions.4-5 Bee Debugging 5: Kei te hē rawa tētahi mea...
short_instructions.4-5 Bee Debugging 7: E ngaro ana tētahi mea i te taumahi...
short_instructions.4-5 Bee Debugging 9: He aha te pī e kore ai e mahi mīere nui rawa?
short_instructions.4-5 Bee Nested Loops 1: Whakamahia te koromeke hei kohi i te katoao te waihonga.
short_instructions.4-5 Maze 10: E taea rānei e koe te haere ki te putiputirā me ngā paraka e whā?
short_instructions.4-5 Maze 6: Aratakina ahau ki te putiputirā mā te whakamahi i ngā nama paraka rua rua noa iho!
short_instructions.CourseD_Dance_2020_05: A muri i nga wahanga e 6 me timatahia to kaikanikani i tetahi nekehanga hou!
short_instructions.CourseD_Dance_2020_10: Ka mau te wehi! Hangaia he kanikani ki te tohatoha atu ki o hoa.
short_instructions.CourseD_Dance_Party_01: Kumea te paraka 'he mea hou' ki te papamahi, me tapiri atu ki roto i te paraka 'tatunga'.
short_instructions.CourseD_Dance_Party_02: Me timatahia te Moose ki te neke a muri i nga wahanga e 4!
short_instructions.CourseD_Dance_Party_03: A muri i nga wahanga e 6 me timatahia to kaikanikani i tetahi nekehanga hou!
short_instructions.CourseD_Dance_Party_04: Tapiri atu he papamuri ki to taupānga.
short_instructions.CourseD_Dance_Party_05: Tapiri atu he paraka hou ki te tīni te nekehanga o to kaikanikani ia wahanga e rua.
short_instructions.CourseD_Dance_Party_06: Hangaia he kaikanikani ā muri me whakaingoatia `Kaikanikani-ā-muri1` ki te kanikani kotahi ki Ngeru.
short_instructions.CourseD_Dance_Party_08: Ka taea e koe te hanga nga kaikanikani takirua kia rite ki te rahi?
short_instructions.CourseD_Dance_Party_09: Ki te tini te tae o te kaikanikani, whakamahia i te paraka `kowhiri te tae`.
short_instructions.CourseD_Dance_Party_10: Whakamahia te paraka `whai atu` kia timata te kai kanikani i te tangi o te waiata.
short_instructions.CourseD_Dance_Party_11: Ko te paraka `te patuhi ki runga` ka whakahaere i te waehere i te wa ka pehi te patuhi kōpere o runga. Me waehere te kaikanikani kia nekehia i te wa ka pehi te patuhi kōpere o runga.
short_instructions.CourseD_Dance_Party_11_5: Whakamahia te paraka/wahanga "nga raki katoa" kia kanikani kotahi nga rakiraki.
short_instructions.CourseD_Dance_Party_11b: Ka "drop" te Karetao ia wa ka pehi te patuhi kōpere mātau, ka "pakipaki" ia wa ka pehi te pātuhi kōpere o runga. Whakamahia kia drop, pakipaki, drop, pakipaki kia tere rawa atu!\*\*
short_instructions.CourseD_Dance_Party_12: Ka mau te wehi! Hangaia he kanikani ki te tohatoha atu ki o hoa.
short_instructions.CourseE_HOC 2018 Level_1: Tikina he waka mai i te pouaka taonga.
short_instructions.CourseE_HOC 2018 Level_10: Haere tōtika ki te whaharoa o te Whakamaharatanga Moana nei.
short_instructions.CourseE_HOC 2018 Level_10_2020: Haere tōtika ki te whaharoa o te Whakamaharatanga Moana nei.
short_instructions.CourseE_HOC 2018 Level_11: Ki te Paraka kikorangi hangaia he roma ki roto i te Whakamaharatanga Moana.

short_instructions.CourseE_HOC 2018 Level_1_2020: Tikina he waka mai i te pouaka taonga.
short_instructions.CourseE_HOC 2018 Level_2: Haere tōtika ki te tauranga o te waka.
short_instructions.CourseE_HOC 2018 Level_2_2020: Haere tōtika ki te tauranga o te waka.
short_instructions.CourseE_HOC 2018 Level_3: Whakawhiti ake te moana nui ki te ika.

short_instructions.CourseE_HOC 2018 Level_4: Whakamahia i te whakahoukoropiko kia tae ake ki te aihe.
short_instructions.CourseE_HOC 2018 Level_4_2020: Whakamahia i te whakahoukoropiko kia tae ake ki te aihe.
short_instructions.CourseE_HOC 2018 Level_5: Whakatōmene te waka kua paepae kia whiwhi ai te pouaka taonga.
short_instructions.CourseE_HOC 2018 Level_5_2020: Whakatōmene te waka kua paepae kia whiwhi ai te pouaka taonga.
short_instructions.CourseE_HOC 2018 Level_6: Whakawhiti i te hukapapa kia tae atu ki te tāmana.
short_instructions.CourseE_HOC 2018 Level_6_2020: Whakawhiti i te hukapapa kia tae atu ki te tāmana.
short_instructions.CourseE_HOC 2018 Level_7a: Kimihia nga whakangaro moana kia whiwhi ai he pouaka taonga.

short_instructions.K-1 Maze 10: Haere mā te taha o te TNT, kia tae ai ahau ki te poaka!
short_instructions.MC HOC 2016 Level 10: Kua eke te wā kia hanga koe i tō ake Mahimaina! Whakaputaina he koiora ka mahi i tāu e hiahia ana. Kia ngahau!
short_instructions.MC HOC 2016 Level 2-2: Kua pakoko te heihei. Hoatu he paraka 'neke', he paraka 'huri' hoki ki te kāniwha 'ina whakaputa' kia neke te heihei.
short_instructions.MC HOC 2016 Level 3: Hūrō, kua neke te heihei! Kātahi ia ka tū. I roto i ngā kēmu kua kore te heihei e tū, ka hīkoi tonu āke, āke. Whakamahia tētahi koromeke 'mahia atu āke, āke' kia neke tonu ngā heihei.\
short_instructions.MC HOC 2016 Level 4: Hanga rerekē ngā heihei ināianei i te āhua ōrite o ngā nekehanga. Ka whakamahia i ngā kēmu ngā nekehanga matapōkere kia motuhenga te hanga o ngā mea. Meatia kia 'huri matapōkere' ngā heihei.
short_instructions.MC HOC 2016 Level 5: Kua hē te ara o ngā kau! Ārahina rātou ki te pātītī me te paraka 'e neke kia kotahi hipanga ki te' ki roto i tētahi koromeke 'mahia atu āke, āke'.
short_instructions.MC HOC 2016 Level 6: E āhei ana koe ki te hanga i ētahi kairoro ināianei. Whakamahia te paraka 'whakaputa' ki te hanga i ngā kairoro e 3 i te takanga o te pō. Meatia kia neke rātou ki a koe. Kia uru mai te rā i te ata kei te ora tonu koe.
short_instructions.MC HOC 2016 Level 8: He pātū kōhatu e aukati ana i te ara ki ō hipi. Māringanui kei konei tētahi Konihi. Kia pā koe ki te Konihi ka pahū ia. Mā te Konihi te pātū e turaki mā te pahū kia tata atu koe ki ō hipi!
short_instructions.MC HOC 2016 New Drop: I te ao Mahimaina ka tuku wūru ngā hipi. Hoatu te paraka 'tuku' ki roto i 'ina whakamahia' kātahi me hīkoi atu ki te hipi ki te whakamahi i a ia ki te tuku i tētahi tuemi.
short_instructions.MC HOC 2016 New Spawn: Kua wātea ināianei te ao kia whakakīia e koe ki ngā mea e hiahiatia ana! Hoatu ngā paraka 'whakaputa' ki raro i 'ina whakahaerehia' ki te whakaputa i ētahi koiora i te tīmatanga o te kēmu.
short_instructions.MC HOC 2016 New Walk: Tēnā, kia torohia e tātou tō tātou ao. Whakamahia ngā pere ki te neke haere, pēhi hoki i te paemokowā, patohia rānei te papa kēmu ki te whakamahi tuemi. E kuhu ki te whare mā te tatau.
short_instructions.MC HOC 2016 SCORE LEVEL: E āhei ana i ētahi kēmu te tapeke piro te tiaki. Me tākaro pā ki ēnei Taipō Rino ka whakamahia ai te paraka 'tāpiritia te 1 ki te tapeke piro' ki te hoatu piro ki a koe ina koe ka pā ki a rātou. Me eke te kaute piro ki te 5 e toa ai koe!
short_instructions.MC HOC 2016 Village Test: Aiiiiiiiii! Kua mau koe e ngā Kairoro. Waeheretia te Taipō Rino ki te aru me te whakaeke i ngā kairoro!
short_instructions.New Sports Project: Waihangahia tō ake kēmu! Ko koe te rangatira: e whakaae ana kia panonihia ngā ture, kia whakawhenumi hoki i ngā momo tākaro, kia auaha! Mutu ana, pāwhiritia te Mutu kia wātea kia whakamātauria e ō hoa ki ā rātou waea.
short_instructions.bounce_1: Whakapiri i tētahi paraka ki te paraka "ina pere mauī", ā, pāwhiritia te "Whakahaerehia". Nekehia te patu mā te whakamahi i te pere mauī kia tae atu ki te ūnga whakamutunga.
short_instructions.bounce_10: He kuru kei runga ināianei. Me whakapiri i te paraka "whakawhiwhi piro" me te paraka "whakawhiwhi piro hoariri" ki te paraka "i te pōro i te kuru" me te paraka "ki te hipa te pōro i te ringa" ki te waihanga kēmu. Me kite koe e hia piro ka riro i a koe i mua i tō hoariri riro piro e rua ngā wā.
short_instructions.bounce_10_basketball: He whāinga kei runga ināianei! Me whakapiri i te paraka "whakawhiwhi piro" me te paraka "whakawhiwhi piro hoariri" ki te paraka "i te pōro i te kuru" me te paraka "ki te hipa te pōro i te ringa" ki te waihanga kēmu. Me kite koe e hia piro ka riro i a koe i mua i tō hoariri riro piro e rua ngā wā.
short_instructions.bounce_10_sports: He kuru kei runga ināianei! Me whakapiri i te paraka "whakawhiwhi piro" me te paraka "whakawhiwhi piro hoariri" ki te paraka "i te pōro i te kuru" me te paraka "ki te hipa te pōro i te ringa" ki te waihanga kēmu. Me kite koe e hia piro ka riro i a koe i mua i tō hoariri riro piro e rua ngā wā!
short_instructions.bounce_11: E āhei ana ināianei ki te whakapiri i te paraka "ina whakahaerehia". Me whakapiri i te paraka hou "maka pōro hou" i ngā wāhi maha. Hei āpiti atu, tēnā panonihia te tirohanga, te tere rānei o te patu me te pōro me te kite e hia piro ka riro i a koe i mua i tō hoariri riro piro e rua ngā wā.
short_instructions.bounce_11_basketball: E āhei ana ināianei ki te whakapiri i te paraka "ina whakahaerehia". Me whakapiri i te paraka hou "maka pōro hou" i ngā wāhi maha. Hei āpiti atu, tēnā panonihia te tirohanga, te tere rānei o te ringa me te pōro me te kite e hia piro ka riro i a koe i mua i tō hoariri riro piro e rua ngā wā!
short_instructions.bounce_11_sports: E āhei ana ināianei ki te whakapiri i te paraka "ina whakahaerehia". Me whakapiri i te paraka hou "maka pōro hou" i ngā wāhi maha. Hei āpiti atu, tēnā panonihia te tirohanga, te tere rānei o te ringa me te pōro me te kite e hia piro ka riro i a koe i mua i tō hoariri riro piro e rua ngā wā!
short_instructions.bounce_12: Waihangahia tō ake kēmu Bounce. E whakaae ana kia panonihia ata me ngā ture. Mutu ana, pāwhiritia te Mutu kia wātea kia whakamātauria e ō hoa ki ā rātou waea.
short_instructions.bounce_12_basketball: Waihangahia tō ake kēmu Poitūkohu. E whakaae ana kia panonihia ngā ture. Mutu ana, pāwhiritia te Mutu kia wātea kia whakamātauria e ō hoa ki ā rātou waea.
short_instructions.bounce_12_sports: Waihangahia tō ake kēmu! Ko koe te rangatira: e whakaae ana kia panonihia ngā ture, kia whakawhenumi hoki i ngā momo tākaro, kia auaha! Mutu ana, pāwhiritia te Mutu kia wātea kia whakamātauria e ō hoa ki ā rātou waea.
short_instructions.bounce_1_basketball: Whakapiri i tētahi paraka ki te paraka "ina pere mauī", ā, pāwhiritia te "Whakahaerehia". Nekehia te ringa mā te whakamahi i te pere mauī kia tae atu ki te ūnga.
short_instructions.bounce_1_sports: Me tae atu ki te haki! Whakapiri i tētahi paraka ki te pakara "ina pere mauī" ka pāwhiritia ai te "Whakahaerehia" ki te neke i te kaitākaro ki te haki.
short_instructions.bounce_2: Whakapiri i tētahi paraka ki te paraka "ina pere matau" me te paraka "ina pere mauī". Nekehia te patu kia tae atu ki ngā ūnga whakamutunga e rua.
short_instructions.bounce_2_basketball: Whakapiri i tētahi paraka ki te paraka "ina pere mauī", ā, pāwhiritia te "Whakahaere". Nekehia te ringa mā te whakamahi i te pere mauī kia tae atu ki ngā ūnga.
short_instructions.bounce_2_sports: E rua ngā haki ināianei! Whakapiri i tētahi paraka ki te paraka "ina pere mauī" me te paraka "ina pere matau" ki te whakaneke i tō kaitākaro i ngā ahunga e rua.
short_instructions.bounce_3: Ināianei me whakamātau i tētahi āhuatanga ōrite me te paraka "ina pere runga". Nekehia te patu ki te ūnga whakamutunga kei runga.
short_instructions.bounce_4: I tēnei wā me tāpiri koe i ngā paraka e whā. Nekehia te patu ki ngā ūnga whakamutunga e whā ki te whakaoti i tēnei panga.
short_instructions.bounce_5: Ka tukuna e mātou tētahi pōro kia rere whakaiho ki te patu. Whakapiri i tētahi paraka ki te paraka "ki te patu te pōro ki te patu" hei whakaū i te taenga atu o te pōro ki te ūnga whakamutunga.
short_instructions.bounce_5_basketball: Kei te tukuna e mātou tētahi pōro kia rere whakaiho ki te ringa. Whakapiri atu i tētahi paraka ki te paraka "ina tuki te pōro ki te ringa" kia mātua tae atu te pōro ki te haki.
short_instructions.bounce_5_sports: Ka rere whakaiho te pere hōkī ki te kaitākaro! Whakapiri i tētahi paraka ki te paraka "ina patu te pōro ki te kaitākaro" ki te patu i te haki.
short_instructions.bounce_6: Kei runga te ūnga whakamutunga ināianei. Me mātua whakapiri koe ki ngā paraka "ki te pā te pōro" ki te whakaoti i tēnei panga.
short_instructions.bounce_6_basketball: Kei runga te haki ināianei. Me mātua whakapiri paraka ki ngā paraka "ina patu te pōro" ki te whakaoti i tēnei panga.
short_instructions.bounce_6_sports: Kei runga te haki ināianei. Me mātua whakapiri paraka ki ngā paraka "ina patu te pōro" ki te whakaoti i tēnei panga.
short_instructions.bounce_7: Me whakapiri paraka ki ngā paraka "mēnā". Me whakatupana i te pōro tae noa atu ki te wā ka tuki ki te ūnga whakamutunga.
short_instructions.bounce_7_basketball: Me whakapiri paraka ki ngā paraka "ina". Me whakatupana i te pōro tae noa atu ki te wā ka tuki ki te haki.
short_instructions.bounce_7_sports: Me whakapiri paraka ki ngā paraka "ina". Me whakatupana i te pōro tae noa atu ki te wā ka tuki ki te haki.
short_instructions.course4_artist_fwp_challenge1: Whakamātauria tēnei papatono, ā, panonihia kia kitea ka aha. E mārama ana ki a koe te whakamahinga? (Mukua rānei, ā, whakakapia me tētahi mea rerekē noa atu)
short_instructions.courseD_maze_nestedLoops4:
Aratakina au ki putiputirā mā ngā paraka rua rua noa iho. \
\
Whakamātauria tētahi koromeke ‘tōai’ ki roto i tētahi atu kia heke iho mai te nui o te waehere e whakamahia ana.
short_instructions.courseD_maze_nestedLoops4_2018:

\
Whakamātauria tētahi koromeke ‘tōai’ ki roto i tētahi atu kia heke iho mai te nui o te waehere e whakamahia ana.

Aratakina au ki putiputirā mā ngā paraka rua rua noa iho. \
\
Whakamātauria tētahi koromeke ‘tōai’ ki roto i tētahi atu kia heke iho mai te nui o te waehere e whakamahia ana.
short_instructions.courseD_maze_nestedLoops6:
Me tae atu ki tētahi taumata kē atu! \
Whakamahi koromeke kia tae atu ai au ki te putiputirā mā ngā koromeke ruarua noa iho.
short_instructions.courseD_maze_nestedLoops6_2018:
Me tae atu ki tētahi taumata kē atu! \
Whakamahi koromeke kia tae atu ai au ki te putiputirā mā ngā koromeke ruarua noa iho.

short_instructions.courseE_bee_functions1: Kohia te waihonga i ia putiputi.
short_instructions.express_maze_debugging9_2019: Whakamahia ngā paraka o te pouaka taputapu ki te waihanga i tō papatono. Tukua a Scrat ki te haere ki te kākano.
short_instructions.express_maze_debugging9_2020: Whakamahia ngā paraka o te pouaka taputapu ki te waihanga i tō papatono. Tukua a Scrat ki te haere ki te kākano.
short_instructions.flappy_1: Whakapiri i tētahi paraka ki te paraka "ina pāwhiri", kātahi ka pāwhiritia te "Whakahaerehia". Pāwhiritia, patupatu rānei i te mata ke te whakaneke i a Flappy ki te ūnga.
short_instructions.flappy_11: Waihangahia tō ake kēmu Flappy. E whakaae ana kia panonihia ngā atanga katoa, ngā ture, ka mutu, te tō ā-papa. Kia mutu koe, pāwhiritia te Mutu kia wātea kia whakamātauria e ō hoa ki ō rātou waea.
short_instructions.flappy_2: Kua tāpiritia he papa. Whakapiri i tētahi paraka ki te paraka "ka tau ki te papa". Me whai tō waehere i te "WHAKAMUTU I TE KĒMU" i te wā ka pao a Flappy ki te papa.
short_instructions.flappy_3: Ko te paraka "ina whakahaerehia" tērā ka whakaae kia whakahaerehia tō waehere ina tīmata tō kēmu. Me ngana ki te tautuhi i te tere o te taumata me te paki ki te ūnga.
short_instructions.flappy_4: Ki te kore koe e tuhi waehere kia pao a Flappy, ka rere ia ki waenganui i ngā taunahua. Me whakapiri i tētahi paraka ki te paraka "ina pao ki tētahi taunahua". Me whai tō waehere i te "WHAKAMUTU I TE KĒMU" i te wā ka pao a Flappy ki te huinga kōrero tuatahi.
short_instructions.flappy_5: Me tāpiri tātou i tētahi papa tātai ka kautehia ai ngā piro i te wā ka karo a Flappy i ngā taunahua. Tāpiritia ki te paraka "ina hipa i tētahi taunahua" ka whakawhiwhi piro ai mā te ārahi i a Flappy kia puta i te huinga kōrere tuatahi.
short_instructions.flappy_6: Me kite mēnā e āhei tonu ana koe ki te whiwhi piro ina meatia a Flappy ki te paki parirau kia iti ake, kia nui ake rānei ngā wā.
short_instructions.flappy_7: Hei whai atu, me ngana ki te panoni i te tirohanga mā te whakapiri i tētahi atu paraka ki te paraka "ina whakahaerehia".
short_instructions.flappy_8: Kei te pai ki te tautuhi i ngā atanga i mea wā, kaua noa iho i te wā ka tīmata te kēmu. Me ngana ki te tautuhi i te tirohanga MATAPŌKERE ina puta tētahi atu āhuatanga pēnei i te wā ka hipa i tētahi taunahua.
short_instructions.flappy_9: Kia rerekē noa iho, ki te tuki ki tētahi taunahua me whakahoki i te tapeke piro ki te 0 kaua kē ia te whakamutu i te kēmu.
short_instructions.frozen circle:
He āhua mīharo te porohita. Ka āhei koe te matapae 
ko tēhea tau ka tuhia hei whakakapi i ngā tohu pātai ki te tā porohita?
short_instructions.scrat 19: Kotahi anō te whakamātau o te paraka "mēnā kē", ka tutuki i a koe i te whakamahinga tuatahi?
